metadata.title: CVE-2014-4150 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
The scheme48-send-definition function in cmuscheme48.el in Scheme 48 allowslocal users to write to arbitrary files via a symlink attack on/tmp/s48lose.tmp.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-4150` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

cmuscheme48-el - 1.9-4
scheme48 - 1.9-4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: scheme48 package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.9-4').
